showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // “I see.
Then, I'll return to my nightmare…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:57}); // “So Sephiroth knows he was created five
years ago?
And about the Jenova Project?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:58}); // “…He was missing,
but has just recently reappeared.”{PAUSE}“He has taken many lives
and is seeking the Promised Land.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:70}); // “Hearing your stories,
is yet another sin for me.”{PAUSE}“More nightmares shall come to me now,
than I previously had.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:76}); // “I was with…Shinra Manufacturing
in Administrative Research,
also known as--the Turks.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:81}); // {Vincent}
“Formerly of the Turks.”{PAUSE}“I have no affiliation with Shinra now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:88}); // {Vincent}
“Ex-AVALANCHE…
Then you wouldn't know Lucrecia…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:87}); // {Vincent}
“You were also with Shinra…?
Then do you know Lucrecia?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:96}); // {Vincent}
“The woman who gave birth to Sephiroth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:100}); // {Vincent}
“That isn't completely wrong,
but just a theory.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:101}); // {Vincent}
“He was born from a beautiful lady.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:102}); // {Vincent}
“That lady was Lucrecia.”{PAUSE}“She was an assistant to Professor Gast
of the Jenova Project.
Beautiful…Lucrecia.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:106}); // {Vincent}
“There was no way to cancel the experiment.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:109}); // {Vincent}
“I let the one I loved, the one I respected most,
face the worst.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // {Barret}
“I woke ya up.
Ya outta be thankin' me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:110}); // {Barret}
“So you started sleepin' in a box?
Gimme a break!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // {Aeris}
“You'll dream about bad things
if you sleep in a place like THIS.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:111}); // {Aeris}
“So your punishment was to sleep?
That's…strange.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // {Red XIII}
“…You don't look good.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:113}); // {Red XIII}
“So you slept as punishment?
Isn't that rather strange logic?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // {Cait Sith}
“Aren't you glad you woke up?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:64}); // {Cait Sith}
“Hey, that's not right---”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:115}); // {Cait Sith}
“You think that's punishing yourself?
You're just sleeping.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // {Yuffie}
“Man, you really WERE having a bad dream!
Even I feel bad!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:68}); // {Yuffie}
“Oh, that's okay.
It was probably depressing anyway.”

dialogStrings:
“…I don't know you.
You must leave.”

{Barret}
“I woke ya up.
Ya outta be thankin' me.”

{Cait Sith}
“Aren't you glad you woke up?”

{Aeris}
“You'll dream about bad things
if you sleep in a place like THIS.”

{Yuffie}
“Man, you really WERE having a bad dream!
Even I feel bad!”

{Cid}
“The air's pretty heavy here.”
“How can you sleep in a place like this?”

“Hmph…a nightmare?
My long sleep has given me
time to atone.”

“I have nothing to say to strangers.
Get out.”{PAUSE}“This mansion is the beginning
of your nightmare.”

“Do you know something?”
Don't say a thing
Talk about Sephiroth

{Tifa}
“Nothing I feel like telling a stranger about.”

“Again…
Do you know anything?”
Nothing
Tell him about Sephiroth

“I see.
Then, I'll return to my nightmare…”

“…Anything to say?”
No, good night
Tell him about Sephiroth

{Cloud}
“Like you said, this mansion
is the beginning of a nightmare.”

{Tifa}
“Just like you said,
this mansion is the start of a nightmare…”

{Cid}
“It's like you said,
this mansion's the beginning of a nightmare.”

{Cloud}
“No, it's not a dream, it's for real.”

{Cid}
“No, it's not a dream, it's the truth.”

{Cloud}
“Sephiroth has lost his mind.
He found the secrets hidden in this mansion…”

{Tifa}
“Sephiroth has lost his mind.
He found the secrets hidden in this mansion…”

{Cid}
“Sephiroth's gone nuts.
He found a ton of secrets
hidden in this mansion…”

“So Sephiroth knows he was created five
years ago?
And about the Jenova Project?”

“…He was missing,
but has just recently reappeared.”{PAUSE}“He has taken many lives
and is seeking the Promised Land.”

{Yuffie}
“Oh, that's okay.
It was probably depressing anyway.”

{Cid}
“Good! I'm not in the mood to hear long stories.
Let's get the hell outta here!”

“Hearing your stories,
is yet another sin for me.”{PAUSE}“More nightmares shall come to me now,
than I previously had.”

“…You're still here.”
Good night
Who are you?

“I was with…Shinra Manufacturing
in Administrative Research,
also known as--the Turks.”

{Vincent}
“Formerly of the Turks.”{PAUSE}“I have no affiliation with Shinra now.”

{Cid}
“{Cid}, formerly of the Space
Program Department.”

{Vincent}
“You were also with Shinra…?
Then do you know Lucrecia?”

{Vincent}
“The woman who gave birth to Sephiroth.”

{Vincent}
“That isn't completely wrong,
but just a theory.”

{Vincent}
“He was born from a beautiful lady.”

{Vincent}
“That lady was Lucrecia.”{PAUSE}“She was an assistant to Professor Gast
of the Jenova Project.
Beautiful…Lucrecia.”

{Vincent}
“There was no way to cancel the experiment.”

{Vincent}
“I let the one I loved, the one I respected most,
face the worst.”

{Barret}
“So you started sleepin' in a box?
Gimme a break!”

{Aeris}
“So your punishment was to sleep?
That's…strange.”

{Tifa}
“So the punishment was sleep?
That's weird.”

{Red XIII}
“So you slept as punishment?
Isn't that rather strange logic?”

{Cid}
“You shouldn't sleep just because of that.
Sleep?”

{Cait Sith}
“You think that's punishing yourself?
You're just sleeping.”

{Vincent}
“If I go with you will I meet Hojo?”

{Vincent}
“If I go with you will I meet Hojo?”

{Cloud}
“Dunno.
But we're after him and Sephiroth.
So, I guess sooner or later…”

{Tifa}
“Hmm, I don't know.
But we're going after Hojo and Sephiroth.
So, we might……”

{Cid}
“I dunno.
But we're going after him and Sephiroth.
So there's a good chance…”

{Vincent}
“All right.
I've decided to go with you.”

{Aeris}
“That sure was a quick change of heart.”

{Cid}
“Hey, hold on sleepy. You're pretty damn pushy!”

{Yuffie}
“Huh? Oh great just what I needed…”

{Vincent}
“Being a former Turk, I may be of help…”

Scarlet
“Our little game of hide and seek ends here.”

Scarlet
“The execution may have been unsuccessful,
but your death by falling and
crashing into the water below
might still be pretty exciting.”

Scarlet
“Why are you still standing there!?
Catch her and take her away!”

Scarlet
“Now it's time to pay up.
Calm down or I'll drop you!”
“Run to the end of the Cannon!!”

{Barret}
“Yo! You sure this is the right way?
It's a dead end!”

{Cait Sith}
“Uh oh?
Did I make a wrong turn?”

{Barret}
“You damn cat!
What the hell're we gonna do now?
They all be comin' soon!”

{Barret}
“Yo, better watch my back
till the end…partner!”
